对公司综合管理体系的持续适宜性、充分性和有效性进行评审，确保体系有效运行，特制定: This procedure is established to review the continuing suitability, adequacy, and effectiveness of the company's integrated management system and to ensure its effective operation.
适用于本公司质量体系(ISO9001、ISO13485、IATF16949、GM: Applicable to the operation of the company's quality systems (ISO9001, ISO13485, IATF16949, GMP) and other systems (ISO14001, ISO45001), all are included within the scope of review.
